basicInfo.about: As a MERN stack developer, I have a strong passion for building scalable and efficient web applications. With a solid foundation in JavaScript, I have honed my skills in MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js to deliver high-quality solutions. My experience with MERN stack has allowed me to work on a wide range of projects, from simple web applications to complex enterprise-level systems. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and explore the latest technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
